title: Interpretation of a dream about drowning in water and emerging from it in a dream

Interpretation of a dream about drowning in water and emerging from it in a dream could be a sign of recovery from an illness, and God knows the unseen. When you see yourself drowning in water and emerging from it, this could be a sign of recovery from an illness, and God knows the unseen. It leads to getting rid of problems, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a young man sees that he is emerging from water, it is evidence that he is free from judgements, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. title: Interpretation of green clothes in a dream and green clothes in a dream

preview.html: A dream of the color green for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, whether the skirt is a blouse, the dress is short, long, light, dark, wide, narrow, new, buys. Seeing a dead person wearing green according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of green clothes in a dream. Seeing clothes and clothing in green is considered a worthy dream. With praise, as the green color is one of the praiseworthy colors that you see in a dream, and seeing the green color in clothes symbolizes religiosity and worship, whether for the living or the dead, and the green color in clothes indicates the stability of the situation. It is known that green clothing is the clothing of the righteous, martyrs, and the people of Paradise, and green clothing in... The dream symbolizes inheritance. Seeing a dead person wearing green clothes indicates his exit from this world to heaven as a righteous person or a martyr. Seeing green clothes in a Muslim or believer’s dream symbolizes goodness in his religion and in the world. If an unmarried or unmarried girl sees that she is wearing a green dress or a garment that covers Her entire body, this indicates protection and kindness, and an indication that she will spend her life in righteousness and guidance. The green color in individual clothing symbolizes good luck in work, career, or love. Seeing an unmarried woman as if she is buying a green veil or veil symbolizes engagement or marriage. Soon, seeing a beautiful green dress in an unmarried woman’s dream is a symbol of her pride, dignity, and status in the middle of her community. It is a symbol of success in a student’s dream, and a sign of goodness and blessing. As for a married woman who sees green clothes and garments in her dream, this indicates an increase in money, kindness, and livelihood. Seeing a married woman wearing a green dress in A dream portends good news or a happy event. Seeing a married woman as if her husband is wearing green clothes foretells that the husband will hear happy news in his work and work. Seeing a married woman in green with a cover, dress or jacket indicates a journey in which kindness and poverty will come. Seeing a married woman as if he were her son And her child wearing green clothes foretells a bright and prosperous future for that child, whether the child is male or female. Seeing a pregnant woman wearing green clothes or a loose green dress indicates ease and blessing in childbirth. A pregnant woman who sees green color in her clothes may be a sign that she will be born a boy, and God is Most High. And I know, if it is in the first three months. As for pregnant women in general, seeing the color green portends the birth of a good child with his parents. In general, seeing the color green on the clothes in a pregnant woman’s dream, whether in the closet or in the room, symbolizes nourishment, blessings, and goodness. And security and peace. Seeing a man wearing green clothes in a dream symbolizes his charitable personality and the knowledge that benefits him. Seeing a man wearing green clothes symbolizes the man’s piety and piety. Seeing the color green in a single man’s dream heralds marriage or a future full of goodness and blessings, God willing. Seeing a man marrying a woman in A green dress indicates available opportunities and good luck that will come

title: The 9 most famous interpretations of seeing a chair in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a chair? It symbolizes a high status. Interpretation of seeing sitting on a chair in a dream? Announcing marriage. What is the interpretation of seeing an electric chair in a dream? Evidence of guilt. Interpretation of seeing a wooden chair in a dream? Evidence that you are uncomfortable with some things in Life. What is the interpretation of seeing a golden chair in a girl’s dream? The elements of purity and religiosity. The chair in Ibn Sirin’s dream. Seeing a chair in a dream means recovery from illness. A chair in a dream indicates a good outcome. Then to see yourself sitting on a chair in a dream means marriage. Seeing A wooden chair is evidence of deception and arrogance in the dreamer. Then seeing an iron chair in a dream indicates the presence of a strong man. Interpretation of seeing a chair in a dream: The chair symbolizes a prestigious position. Seeing a wheelchair in a dream means that the dreamer makes quick decisions. Seeing a rocking chair in a dream indicates On a person who hesitates in his decisions. An electric chair in a dream is a sign of guilt. A wooden chair in a dream indicates a feeling of discomfort about some things in life. Seeing a chair in a dream often means changing some situations at work. Seeing a chair in a dream for a married woman. The chair in A married woman’s dream is evidence of the benefits she will receive from her husband. Then seeing a silver chair is evidence of good news of pregnancy in the near future. If you see buying a chair, it means moving to a new house. Interpretation of seeing a chair for single peopleWhen an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is sitting on A wooden chair, this is good news about her future marriage. So, seeing a golden chair in a girl’s dream is evidence of purity and religiosity. A girl seeing an iron chair is evidence that a strong, righteous man has entered her life and is trying to help her. So, seeing an unmarried woman sitting on a white chair In a dream, it is a sign of marriage or getting a good job. Seeing a chair in a dream for a pregnant woman. An iron chair in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the presence of a male child. When a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is sitting on a chair and wearing a crown, this indicates a beautiful child on her way. Hence, seeing yourself sitting on a white chair in a dream is a sign of the exhaustion that you will feel during pregnancy. If a pregnant woman sees herself falling from the chair, this indicates the loss of the fetus. Interpretation of seeing a chair for a man: Seeing an unmarried man sitting on a chair with a beautiful appearance, This is evidence of his marriage to a girl with honorable morals and origins. After that, when he sees the young man sitting on a chair and remaining still, he will be exposed to illness. Then seeing a broken chair in a dream is evidence that this young man will fall into problems and fears. When the young man sees that he is giving someone a chair, He will obtain a high position at work. Then seeing a man sitting in a dream on a chair made of plastic, this indicates that he is a liar and a hypocrite.

title: The most important interpretations of seeing chicken in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Chicken in a dream contains many clues and interpretations that the owners of these visions would like to know, and given the multiplicity of interpretations provided by our distinguished researchers on this topic, here is the following article that will help you determine the most important of them. Let’s read the following. Chicken in a dream indicates the dreamer’s vision of chicken in a dream Indicating that he will earn a lot of money in the coming period from his work, which is a market that will flourish greatly. Whoever dreams of eating uncooked chicken meat, this is a sign that he is talking about others with great evil behind their backs, and this act is unacceptable and must be stopped immediately. In the event that he sees The dreamer sees chickens during his sleep, this indicates the abundance of goodness that he will enjoy in his life in the coming period. The dreamer’s vision in a dream about chickens symbolizes the great effort he makes to provide a decent life for his family and meet all their requirements. Chickens in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer who sees Chicken in a dream is a sign that he will get a lot of money that will allow him to pay off his debts. If one sees a chicken in his dream and chases it until he catches it, then this is a sign that he is willing to work hard for the comfort of his family and provide them with all the basic means of life. If the dreamer sees the chicken during If he sleeps and holds it, this expresses the good news that will reach his ears in the coming period. The dreamer seeing in a dream about chickens around him symbolizes the abundant goodness that he will enjoy in his life and will make him feel very good. Chicken in a dream Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi interprets the dreamer’s vision of chickens In a dream, it is an indication that there is a person near him who keeps all his secrets and does not reveal any of them to anyone. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is slaughtering chickens, this is a sign that he will find a girl who suits him and propose to marry her immediately. Whoever sees in his dream that he is eating chickens in his house While he is dead, this represents the shameful acts he commits that make everyone hate him. If the dreamer sees many chickens in a dream, this is a sign of the abundant money he will obtain behind the inheritance that he will soon receive his share. What is the interpretation of seeing chickens in one dream? Chickens in a dream For a single woman, she stated that she was able to achieve many things that she had dreamed of for a long time and this would make her very happy. If the dreamer sees chickens in her dream, this is a sign of good news that will reach her in the near future, which will make her very happy. If the dreamer sees chickens in his dream, this indicates That her future partner has many good qualities that will make her happy with him. The girl in her dream who saw raw chicken and ate it symbolizes that she participates in gossip and gossip meetings with unworthy people and must stay away from them immediately before they cause her death. What is the interpretation of seeing a cooked chicken? In a single woman’s dream? Seeing chicken cooked in a dream by unmarried women is a sign of the abundance of money that she will recover from her business, which will be very prosperous. If

title: Eating raisins in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Through the following lines from the website gptafser.com/, we will tell you the meanings of this dream and the good or evil it carries for the man of opinion. Interpretation of seeing eating raisins in a dream for a single girl. Eating raisins for an unmarried woman in a dream is good news that will bring her happiness in her life, God willing. When he sees Himself eating raisins in a dream, then he may be engaged to her, or he will get a job, or perhaps he will excel at her in school life. Perhaps seeing raisins in a dream is a sign that he will obtain money or an inheritance, and God knows best. As for yellow raisins in a dream, it means an unmarried woman who She eats them, indicating marriage to a man who will not be stingy with her. If a girl gets engaged and sees herself eating raisins, this is a sign that she will marry her fiancé and live with him permanently. If a girl gives raisins to a man she knows, this indicates the approaching marriage. And God knows best. Raisins in a girl’s dream are a sign of the success of her relationship with people, through which she was able to achieve her dreams. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing raisins in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a woman eating raisins in a dream. When you see a married woman eating raisins in a dream, this indicates The happiness she enjoys with her family. Eating raisins in a married woman’s dream is a sign of pregnancy, God willing. And when she sees her husband entering in a dream while returning from work carrying raisins, it tells her that her husband will get a promotion. Raisins in a married woman’s dream indicate that she is trying to raise Her children in a good way, in order to achieve their justice, God willing. Perhaps seeing raisins and then buying them in a dream indicates nutrition, or it may symbolize the beginning of pregnancy. God knows best. Eating raisins in a dream could be a sign of paying off debts or supporting yourself in another business. And God knows best. Interpretation of the vision of eating raisins in a dream about a man and its meaning. When a person sees himself in a dream eating raisins, he happily announces the arrival of profits and profits that he has reaped from a lawful source. The vision of eating raisins is considered one of the good visions that bring goodness to its owner. It indicates continuous work that It is the source of human livelihood. Seeing a man eating raisins may be news of his wife’s pregnancy and birth. And God knows best. The farmer who sees himself eating raisins is a sign that he will make a profit this year from his crop. A man who is close to God when he sees a vision of eating raisins shows his good morals and faith. It is a vision that conveys repentance to the sinner, and he must turn to God and pray to Him. Until his repentance is accepted. Whoever sees himself eating raisins in a dream and looking for a job, this symbolizes finding a job. Seeing raisins being fed to a familiar person in a dream symbolizes the benefit that will accrue to him from this person. But if he sees that someone is offering him raisins and feeding him with them, then he will give him good news. About the livelihood that he brings, and God knows best. If a person sees in a dream that he is sitting with his wife and eating raisins with her, it may be the possibility of pregnancy, or it may be happiness between them and living in prosperity, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of eating raisins in a dream, meaning of seeing her eating raisins in Pregnant dream

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person buying an old house in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dead person buying an old house in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of seeing a dead person buying an old house in a dream. You can make mistakes and you can be beaten, except that the location and authorities have nothing to do with the interpretations. Interpretation of seeing a dead person buying an old house in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that the deceased was buying an old house in a dream may indicate obstacles occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. If one sees the deceased buying a new house, this may indicate good things and material gains that the dreamer may obtain in his life during those days. Seeing the deceased buying an old house in a dream may indicate bad events that happen to the dreamer during this period, and God knows best. Whoever sees in a dream that the deceased has made an old purchase may indicate the tension and pressure that the dreamer felt at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person buying furniture in a dream In the event that one sees that the deceased was buying furniture for the house, this may indicate Positive changes happen to the dreamer to a large extent during this period. When you see a deceased person buying furniture in the neighborhood in a dream, this may indicate good changes that happen to the dreamer during this period, thanks to God. Whoever dreams of a dead person who was buying furniture for the house in a dream, this may indicate a livelihood. Great and good events will happen to the dreamer in the coming period, thanks to God. Seeing the deceased buying furniture for his home in a dream may indicate changes occurring to the people of the house or joys that will come to them, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person buying vegetables in a dream: If you see the dead person buying vegetables in In a dream, this may indicate the great choices that come to the dreamer at that time, thanks to God. When you see the dead buying vegetables for the living in your dream, this may indicate the abundance of a good and ample diet that you will have during this time, and God knows best. Who dreams that the deceased was Buying vegetables for the living may indicate future joys for the dreamer at that time, thanks to God. In the event that he sees the deceased buying vegetables, this could indicate the end of the debts and financial crises that the dreamer faced in the previous period, thanks to God. Interpretation of dreams for the deceased to buy fish in a dreamIf one sees That the deceased was buying a fish in a dream, this may indicate the end of worries and sorrow from the dreamer’s life during this period, thanks to God. Anyone who sees in a dream that the deceased was buying a fish, could indicate rejection of the intense sadness that the dreamer was suffering from at that time. And God knows best. Dreaming of a deceased person buying fish in a dream may indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer during this period, and God knows best. If one sees that the deceased was buying fish and serving fried fish, this may indicate that he heard happy news during this period. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person buying medicine in a dream. If one sees a deceased person buying medicine in a dream, this may indicate his faults that were present in his life.

title: Learn about the interpretation of a pregnant woman with twins in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a pregnant woman with twins in a dream is different, and according to insight, there is no doubt that pregnancy is one of the most happy news that every married woman awaits, especially if the pregnancy is with twins. Who hates seeing twins, but if the dreamer is a single girl, then this makes her wonder about seeing the dream and seek to know its meanings so that we can learn about it. All positive and negative meanings for everyone who sees it throughout the article. Pregnant with twins in a dream by Ibn SirinPregnant with twins in a dreamThe interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream with twins expresses the coming of good things, because seeing children brings sustenance and goodness, so the vision is good news for achieving goals and aspirations in life.If The dreamer was suffering from a financial crisis, her Lord will honor her and expand her livelihood in the coming period. If the twins are similar, the meaning is not evil, but rather expresses a happy life full of goodness and prosperity. As for male twins, this leads to the passage of some unpleasant events that must The dreamer must accept it and be patient as it is. As for seeing twins, there is no doubt that it is a happy vision as it is a reality. Girls are the source of happiness and pleasure in reality and in the dream as well. If the dreamer desires something, he will get it soon, thanks to God Almighty. Your dream will find its interpretation In seconds. Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site from Google. Pregnant with twins in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a pregnant woman with twins in a dream portends good and does not portend evil unless the dreamer does not rejoice. The vision indicates fatigue and anxiety that go away with the remembrance of God Almighty. The vision is a sign of abundant nourishment that never stops, and the fulfillment of happy dreams and desires. If the dreamer sees twins crying at birth, this warns him of imminent problems in his life and he needs to think carefully to reach the appropriate solution. If the dreamer is single, the vision is promising and evidence. On her happy relationship with a person who makes her heart happy and achieves everything she desires in life. If the twin is a male, then it is necessary to pay attention to everything that the dreamer intends to do in the coming period, as there are some unfortunate events that await her and she must pray to her Lord to rid her of all evil. Pregnant with twins In a dream for a single woman: Being pregnant with twins in a woman’s dream is not a bad dream. Rather, it portends a very great benefit that will relieve her of the financial distress she is suffering from at this time, as she will get a lot of money at the first opportunity. If the twin is a male, this means that she will hear some Unpleasant news in the coming days, but she must pray a lot so that her Lord will help her get rid of all evil. As for seeing twins, a boy and a girl, this indicates that she will fall into many debts and many demands on her head, but she should not be afraid of these debts, She will pay it off soon and it won't take long. . We find that this dream will soon lead to this girl’s engagement, but it will not last long due to lack of understanding, and here she must be careful in choosing her partner so that she does not regret separating again. Pregnant with twins.

title: Ibn Sirin explains the vision of drinking wine in a dream

preview.html: Drinking alcohol in a dream is one of the greatest sins that God has forbidden in Islam. He even cursed its seller, owner, drinker, and buyer, but dream interpretation scholars said that seeing drinking wine in a dream is one of the things that differentiates between good and evil, and the interpretation depends entirely on the human condition. Whether it is in a dream or in its general state. Seeing yourself drinking alcohol in a dream. What is the interpretation of drinking alcohol in a dream? Interpretation scholars said: Whoever sees himself drinking alcohol in a dream commits many sins and does not pay attention to them, and if he drinks alone, it is evidence that he will earn a lot. Taboo, some have said so evidence. Of selling the house in which he lives. If he finds someone arguing with him over drinking alcohol, this is evidence that he is suffering from many problems, and drinking alcohol in a dream is evidence of lack of kinship and disobedience to parents. This vision could be evidence of wasting money or a person being exposed to a lot of Of debts, as some said that drinking alcohol with a woman indicates that he will get married. What is the interpretation of drinking alcohol in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq? His interpretation was the prohibition of earning money through illegal means, and if a person mixes alcohol with water in a dream, it is evidence that he is mixing legitimate money with forbidden money. He said that this vision is one of the worst visions. Because it is evidence of many sins and the sins of those who see them. What is the interpretation of drinking alcohol in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Drinking alcohol in a dream is evidence of the prohibition of his wealth, and if he drinks alcohol until his mind disappears, it is evidence of his dissatisfaction with God’s blessing upon him. Whoever sees himself drinking alcohol has He tore his clothes, or someone who drank with him did that, then this is clear evidence of his dissatisfaction with what God has written for him, and he must approach his Lord and thank Him very much. from him. Blessings to him.Still not finding an interpretation of your dream? Go to Google and search for the Egyptian dream interpretation site. Drinking alcohol in a dream for a single woman. Scientists have agreed that the unmarried girl saw herself drinking alcohol, but she did not get drunk and the alcohol did not distract her mind. This is clear evidence of the abundance of goodness for her, and it will bring her great benefit. It is also Evidence that she will move on to a new life. If she is not engaged, then she is engaged. If she is engaged, she will get married. If she drinks until she drinks, then this is evidence that she is engaged. Helpless and weak in the face of one of the issues she facesIf an unmarried woman proposes to her fiancé, and she is hesitant to accept him, and she sees herself drinking alcohol in a dream, this is evidence for her that she will agree to that person who proposed to her. Drinking alcohol in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees herself in The dream in which she drinks alcohol until she becomes drunk is clear evidence of her ignorance of many of her family’s affairs, and that she is one of the women who cannot control herself. Her mind is always distracted, and this is a sign to her that she must turn to the affairs of her husband and children. Drinking alcohol in a dream for a pregnant woman. The interpretation of a vision of a woman drinking alcohol during pregnancy is divided into two parts. The second of these sections is if she is close to God, and is evidence of many good things for her and the Lord.

title: Interpretation of a dream about an eye injury in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: An injured eye in a dream is one of the most disturbing dreams for the dreamer, such as eye disease, eye injury, eye swelling and swelling, or a person who lost an eye and other visions that may cause him an unusual state of anxiety and tension. Confusion, to know the correct interpretation of the dream, such as an eye injury is one of the most annoying things that a person can go through in his general life, and he can resort to many medications and doctors, to obtain recovery and comfort, but if he sees it in a dream, the dreamer begins to think about the reason for the dream, In order to get an interpretation.Interpretation of the injured eye in a dreamSeeing the injured eye in a dream. Evidence that the dreamer will be exposed to great harm in his general life, whether in the family or money, which may cause his life to be completely disrupted. Seeing an eye suffering from conjunctivitis in a dream is evidence that the dreamer has not completed his religion in life, and it also indicates that he is a person who does not pay zakat. Or money and he will suffer from weak faith in the near future. Losing eyesight in a dream also indicates that the dreamer will become disloyal, follow Satan in public life, and turn away from Almighty God. Losing an eye or having his eye injured in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will follow Satan’s whims and turn away About the right and proper path in public life and also earning money through illegal means. Seeing sick eyes in a dream and healing in the same dream is evidence that the dreamer will turn away from God, but will return soon. Dreaming about an eye injury means that your inner strength cannot handle life. Dreaming about an injury In the eye means that you will receive bad news. If you see an injured eye in a dream, it means that your financial situation may definitely decline and you will be affected by an unexpected loss that will put you in a stressful situation. If you intend to get money, then dreaming of an eye injury means that you will not get money. Unfortunately, you should start saving money now. You will get through this difficult stage quickly if you make good choices. Dreaming about an eye injury means that you will be betrayed. This betrayal may come from a trusted relative. This will make you suffer and you will not have confidence in your ability to really know people and be careful not to put everyone in the same basket. You should not think that all the people around you are trustworthy and good and just want you to be happy, chances are it is quite the opposite. However, if the relationship Currently bad with a certain person and you saw the injured eye in your dream, it means that it will allow you to clarify things with that person to get back on track and repair the relationship. Dreaming of an injured eye in the dream also indicates that you will have a discrepancy at work, such as a change of workplace, office or Change of colleagues at work, and this difference will create emotional tension and make you a little irritable. Keep calm and try to find a calm and intelligent solution. Anyone who sees an injury to his eye in a dream means that there is a message that your subconscious mind is sending you, which is that you should remain confident in yourself. In the end, you will find someone who appreciates you and compensates you appropriately. The dream indicates a...

title: Seeing red pepper in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing red pepper in a dream for one girl: A single girl sees herself eating red pepper in a dream. A sign of the happy days that she will experience in her coming life. Seeing red pepper in a dream for one girl is an indication of satisfying her desires that she sought before, such as travel or a specific job, and God knows best. Either an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream picking red peppers. It is a metaphor for obtaining a lot of money in a short time, such as obtaining a large inheritance, and God knows best. Whether she saw herself eating red peppers with another person in a dream for a single girl. It shows that she will soon marry a man. Valid. If an unmarried girl sees that she is giving her mother red pepper in a dream. This indicates that the fortuneteller is close to her family and his family, and that she cares about her mother, and God knows best. As for seeing hot red pepper in a dream for a single girl. The dream indicates that there are many problems to which the dreamer is exposed. But it will end soon, and God knows best. See also: Yellow pepper in a dream. Interpretation of seeing red pepper in a dream for a married woman. A married woman sees herself in a dream eating red pepper. The dream symbolizes many profits that the dreamer will receive soon. The red pepper that an unmarried woman sees is scattered on the ground. In a dream. It indicates the blessing and goodness that the dreamer will receive in time, and God knows best. And if a married woman dreams that her husband brings her red pepper in the dream and she is happy with it. It is a metaphor for intense love and devotion to his wife. And if you see red pepper present and spreading in the house A married woman. A sign that the house is full of problems and disagreements, but it will end soon. Either seeing red pepper in the cupboard in a dream is for a married woman. A symbol of getting a lot of profit and money to see, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing red pepper in a dream about a man and its meaning. A man dreams of eating red pepper in The dream. A sign of the good that the dreamer will receive in his next life. Whether the man is distributing red pepper on the street in the dream. The vision is a symbol that the dreamer possesses many qualities that make him a good and suitable person and a role model for others. Seeing red pepper in abundance in a man’s dream. Metaphor Fortunately for him in his life, God willing. The presence of red pepper everywhere a man steps in a dream. It is a sign that the means of livelihood are broad everywhere they are found. Read also: Seeing green pepper during sleep. The meaning of seeing red pepper in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. The appearance of red pepper In a dream for a pregnant woman. It is good news for the health of the fetus and facilitates childbirth, God willing. As for the pregnant woman, she sees herself eating red pepper in a dream. A vision that indicates ample provision for the newborn after birth. It also indicates that labor will pass safely and without danger. A pregnant woman when she sees someone An unknown person carrying red pepper in his hands in a dream. A bad sign that the dreamer feels very confused about an important matter in her life, and God knows best. Seeing red pepper distributed in a dream to a pregnant woman. A sign that the visionary will be promoted in her workplace. If
